Communication and Interaction.text: How long has Johnny attended this setting?
How many hours a week does he attend?
Who lives at home?
What languages do you speak at home?
Are there any other services involved supporting him?
Has he got any diagnosis?
Has he been referred to any services?
How was your pregnancy and early development?
Were there any concerns?
What happened as a result of concerns?
What services got involved and when?
How does Johnny communicate his basic needs?
Does he use words, phrases, sounds, lead you by the hand, gestures?
Or does he not attempt to communicate his needs?
Do adults need to interpret what he wants?
Does Johnny respond to his name?
Does he give you eye contact?
Does he understand routines, simple instructions?
Does he understand information and explanations?
Does Johnny interact with other people, with children, with adults?
Does he initiate interactions or does he respond to interactions initiated by others?

Cognition and Learning.text: Is his play repetitive and narrow in scope?
Does he respond to questions in stories?
Does he sit down for group sessions?
Does he engage in any adult-led tasks?
How is his focus and attention?
Does he tend to move around different activities or focus on activities for short periods or long periods?
Does he enjoy moving around, outdoor play?
Does he have any knowledge of numbers, letters, shapes, or colors?
Can he sing, copy actions in songs?
Does he play with other children?

Social, Emotional and Mental Health (SEM.text: Is Johnny settled and happy to attend nursery?
Does he transition well from home to school and from school to home?
Does he separate well from parents?
Does he get upset or distressed?
What makes him upset or distressed?
When he’s distressed or upset, what are his behaviours like?
How long does it take to calm down?
Does he have good attachment relationships with the adults in the setting?
Does he play with other children?
Does he acknowledge what goes on around him?
Is he in his own world most of the time?

Physical and Sensory.text: Does Johnny have any sensory difficulties such as aversion to noises or loud sounds, crowded or busy environments, sensory-seeking or avoidance behaviors?
Does he have an aversion to certain food textures?
Can he use the toilet independently?
Can he manage his self-care needs independently, such as dressing and undressing, washing hands, feeding himself, toileting?
Are his gross motor skills developing well?
Can he run, jump, climb, or ride a bike?
Is he good at managing his environment, spatial awareness, balance, and coordination?
Are his fine motor skills developing well?
Can he engage in scribbling, mark making, or any hand motor skills activities?
Does he respond to “no” and “stop” instructions?
Can he hold hands when outdoors?
